actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority for solar and geothermal energy research and development programs of the National Science Foundation (deferral No. D75-129) which was proposed by the President in his special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Disapproves the deferral of budget authority for solar and geothermal energy research and development programs of the National Science Foundation (D75-129) which was proposed by the President in his special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted to the Congress under the Impoundment Control Act.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority for solar and geothermal energy research and development programs of the National Science Foundation (deferral No. D75-129) which was proposed by the President in his special message of November 26, 1974, transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
